financialSupport.title: Ukusekela Kwezimali
financialSupport.description: Thola izeluleko zokutshala imali ezilungiselelwe wena futhi uye ezingqungqutheleni zezimali eziqinisayo.

seminar1.title: Abesifazane Ebhizinisini: Ukuqala Ukutshala Imali Kwakho Kokuqala
seminar1.description: Funda izisekelo zokutshala imali nokuthi ungaqala kanjani ukwakha inotho yekusasa lakho.

seminar2.title: Iworkshop Yokuzimela Ngezimali
seminar2.description: Amasu asebenzayo okufeza ukuzimela ngezimali njengomuntu wesifazane osebenza ngokuzimela.

seminar3.title: Isabelomali Nokonga Komama Abazimele
seminar3.description: Amakhono abalulekile esabelomali namasu okonga alungiselelwe omama abazimele.

emergencyFund.title: Yakha Isikhwama Sesimo Esiphuthumayo
emergencyFund.description: Qala ngokonga izindleko zezinyanga ezi-3-6 ezimweni ezingalindelekile.

education.title: Tshala Imali Emfundweni Yezimali
education.description: Ulwazi lunamandla. Funda ngezabelomali, ukutshala imali, nohlelo lwezimali.

diversifyIncome.title: Hlukanisa Imali Engenayo Yakho
diversifyIncome.description: Dala imithombo eminingi yemali engenayo ukuze wandise ukuzinza kwezimali.

retirement.title: Hlela Ukuthatha Umhlalaphansi Kusenesikhathi
retirement.description: Uma uqala kusenesikhathi, imali yakho inesikhathi esingaphezulu sokukhula.

trackExpenses.title: Landelela Izindleko Zakho
trackExpenses.description: Ukuqonda ukuthi imali yakho iya kuphi kuyisinyathelo sokuqala ekulawuleni izimali.

gbvSupport.title: Ukusekela kwe-GBV
gbvSupport.description: Thola usekelo olusheshayo nezindawo zokuphephela ezivikelekile lapho uzidinga kakhulu.

sanitaryAid.title: Usizo Lokuhlanzeka
sanitaryAid.description: Thola amabhokisi okunikela aseduze futhi ufinyelele izinsiza zokuhlanzeka ezibalulekile.

aiAssistant.title: Umsizi we-AI
aiAssistant.description: Thola izimpendulo ezisheshayo nokuqondiswa kusistimu yethu yosekelo ehlakaniphile.

submitRequests.title: Thumela Izicelo
submitRequests.description: Thumela futhi ulandelele izicelo zakho zosekelo ngesistimu yethu elula ukuyisebenzisa.

aboutUs.title: Ngathi
aboutUs.description: Funda kabanzi ngomgomo wethu wokuqinisa abesifazane kulo lonke iNingizimu Afrika.

cta.title: Usukulungele Ukuqala?
cta.description: Joyina izinkulungwane zabesifazane abathole usekelo nokuqiniswa ngenkundla yethu.

requests.title: Izicelo Zokusekela
requests.subtitle: Thumela izicelo ezintsha futhi ulandelele ezikhona
requests.noRequestsDesc: Qala ngokuthumela isicelo sakho sokuqala sokusekela
requests.name: Igama

req001.description: Ngifuna izeluleko zokutshala imali zebhizinisi elincane

req003.description: Ngifuna amabhokisi okunikela aseduze emikhiqizo yokuhlanzeka

aiAssistant.title: Umsizi we-AI
aiAssistant.subtitle: Thola izimpendulo ezisheshayo nokuqondiswa kusistimu yethu ehlakaniphile yokusekela
aiAssistant.welcomeMessage: Sawubona! Ngingumsizi wakho we-EmpowerHub. Ngilapha ukukukusiza ngemibuzo mayelana nezeluleko zezimali, ukusekela kwe-GBV, usizo lwezempilo, nanoma yiziphi ezinye izinsizakalo zokusekela. Ngingakusiza kanjani namuhla?

chat.keyboardHint: Cindezela u-Enter ukuthumela, u-Shift+Enter kumugqa omusha

aiAssistant.footer: Ezindabeni eziphuthumayo, sicela ushayele imigqa yethu yezimo eziphuthumayo ngqo

mockResponses.response1: Ngiyaqonda ukuthi ufuna usizo. Ake ngikuphe ukuqondiswa ngalesi sihloko.
mockResponses.response2: Lowo umbuzo omuhle! Ngokusekelwe ekubuzeni kwakho, ngingancoma ukuthi ubheke amakhasi ethu athile okusekela ukuthola ulwazi oluningiliziwe.
mockResponses.response3: Ngilapha ukusiza! Ukuze uthole usizo olusheshayo ezindabeni eziphuthumayo, ungangabazi ukushayela imigqa yethu yezimo eziphuthumayo.
mockResponses.response4: Ngiyabonga ngokuthinta. Ngingakusiza ukuxhumanisa nezinsiza ezifanele nezinsizakalo zokusekela.
mockResponses.response5: Lowo umbuzo obalulekile. Ipulatifomu yethu inikeza ukusekela okubanzi kwezinsizakalo zezimali, ukuphepha, nezempilo.

sanitaryAid.title: Usizo Lwezempilo & Ukusekela Kwezemvelo
sanitaryAid.subtitle: Thola amikhiqizo yamahhala ezempilo nezidingo zezemvelo emabhokisini ethu okunikela eNingizimu Afrika

capeTown.name: Umtapo Wezincwadi Omkhulu waseKapa
capeTown.address: 60 Strand Street, Cape Town City Centre, Western Cape
capeTown.hours: NgoMsombuluko-NgoLwesihlanu: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM, NgoMgqibelo: 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM
capeTown.description: Itholakala esangweni elikhulu. Ukufinyelela kwamahhala kumikhiqizo ebalulekile yezemvelo kwabesifazane abaswele.

johannesburg.name: Ikliniki Yezempilo Yabesifazane yaseJohannesburg
johannesburg.hours: NgoMsombuluko-NgoLwesihlanu: 7:00 AM - 7:00 PM, Ngamaphelasonto: 8:00 AM - 2:00 PM
johannesburg.description: Amikhiqizo yamahhala yezemvelo atholakala endaweni yokwamukela. Inqubomgomo yokungabuzi mibuzo.

durban.name: Isikhungo Somphakathi saseDurban
durban.address: 45 Dr Pixley KaSeme Street, Durban Central, KwaZulu-Natal
durban.description: Ibhokisi lokunikela elisekelwa umphakathi. Zisizele kokho okudingayo.

tips.tip1: Shintsha amikhiqizo ezempilo njalo emahora angu-4-6
tips.tip2: Geza izandla ngaphambi nangemuva kokushintsha amikhiqizo
tips.tip3: Sebenzisa indlela eyodwa kuphela ngesikhathi (iphedi NOMA i-tampon)
tips.tip4: Gcina umkhondo womjikelezo wakho ukuze uhlele kangcono

tips.tip1: Geza izindawo zangasese ngamanzi afudumele nesipho esithambile
tips.tip2: Hlala usula kusuka phambili uye emuva

donation.title: Ufuna Ukunikela?
donation.description: Siza ukugcina amabhokisi ethu okunikela egcwele amikhiqizo abalulekile ezemvelo.

gbvSupport.title: Ukusekela kwe-GBV & Amakhaya Aphephile
gbvSupport.subtitle: Ukusekela okusheshayo nezindawo zamakhaya aphephile kwabesifazane ababhekene nodlame olusekelwe ebulilini

emergencyAlert.title: Usengozini Esheshayo?
emergencyAlert.description: Shayela u-0800 428 428 (Isikhungo Sokulawula i-GBV) noma u-10111 (Amaphoyisa) ngokushesha. Lezi zinsizakalo ziyatholakala 24/7 futhi zimahhala ngokuphelele.

safeHaven.name: Ikhaya Eliphephile Labesifazane
safeHaven.address: 123 Hope Street, Cape Town, Western Cape
safeHaven.description: Indawo ephephile enikeza ukusekela okubanzi kwabesifazane nezingane ezibalekela udlame lwasekhaya.

ubuntu.name: Indawo Engcwele Yabesifazane i-Ubuntu
ubuntu.description: Inikeza indawo ephephile nezinsizakalo zokusekela eziphelele kwabasinde bodlame olusekelwe ebulilini.

themba.name: Indlu kaThemba
themba.description: Ikhaya elisekelwe emphakathini elinikeza ukuphepha okusheshayo nezinhlelo zokuqinisa isikhathi eside.

finance.title: Ukuqinisa Ngezimali
finance.subtitle: Thola izeluleko zezimali ezilungiselelwe wena, yiya ezingqungqutheleni eziqinisayo, futhi wakhe indlela yakho yokuqina ngezimali

seminar1.title: Abesifazane Ebhizinisini: Ukuqala Ukutshala Imali Kwakho Kokuqala
seminar1.description: Funda izisekelo zokutshala imali nokuthi ungaqala kanjani ukwakha inotho yekusasa lakho.

seminar2.title: Iworkshop Yokuzimela Ngezimali
seminar2.description: Amasu asebenzayo okufeza ukuzimela ngezimali njengomuntu wesifazane osebenza ngokuzimela.

seminar3.title: Isabelomali Nokonga Komama Abazimele
seminar3.description: Amakhono abalulekile esabelomali namasu okonga alungiselelwe omama abazimele.

emergencyFund.title: Yakha Isikhwama Sesimo Esiphuthumayo
emergencyFund.description: Qala ngokonga izindleko zezinyanga ezi-3-6 ezimweni ezingalindelekile.

education.title: Tshala Imali Emfundweni Yezimali
education.description: Ulwazi lunamandla. Funda ngezabelomali, ukutshala imali, nohlelo lwezimali.

diversifyIncome.title: Hlukanisa Imali Engenayo Yakho
diversifyIncome.description: Dala imithombo eminingi yemali engenayo ukuze wandise ukuzinza kwezimali.

retirement.title: Hlela Ukuthatha Umhlalaphansi Kusenesikhathi
retirement.description: Uma uqala kusenesikhathi, imali yakho inesikhathi esingaphezulu sokukhula.

trackExpenses.title: Landelela Izindleko Zakho
trackExpenses.description: Ukuqonda ukuthi imali yakho iya kuphi kuyisinyathelo sokuqala ekulawuleni izimali.

about.title: Mayelana ne-EmpowerHub
about.subtitle: I-EmpowerHub iqinisa abesifazane eNingizimu Afrika ngokunikeza izeluleko zokutshala imali ezilungiselelwe wena nezingqungquthela, ukusekela okusheshayo kwe-GBV nezindawo zokuphephela eziphephile, nokufinyelela emabhokisini okunikela ezempilo. Lesi sisombululo esihlanganisiwe sibonisa ukuzinikela kwethu ekuqiniseni ukuzimela, ukuphepha, nesithunzi.
about.missionText: Ukudala ipulatifomu ehlanganisiwe eqinisa abesifazane kulo lonke iNingizimu Afrika ngokunikeza izinsizakalo zokusekela eziphelele ezibhekene nokuzimela ngezimali, ukuphepha komuntu siqu, nezidingo zokuhlanzeka eziyisisekelo esisombululweni esisodwa esingafinyeleka.

financialEmpowerment.title: Ukuqinisa Ngezimali
financialEmpowerment.description: Izeluleko zokutshala imali ezilungiselelwe wena, izingqungquthela zezimali, nezinsiza zokwakha ukuzimela ngomnotho.

gbvSupport.title: Ukusekela kwe-GBV
gbvSupport.description: Ukusekela okusheshayo nezindawo zokuphephela eziphephile kwabesifazane ababhekene nodlame olusekelwe ebulilini.

sanitaryAid.title: Usizo Lwezempilo
sanitaryAid.description: Ukufinyelela emikhiqizweni ebalulekile yezempilo ngamabhokisi okunikela abekwe ngendlela ehlakaniphile.

empowerment.title: Ukuqinisa
empowerment.description: Sikholelwa ekuqiniseni ukuzimela kwabesifazane ngemfundo, izinsiza, nokusekela.

safety.title: Ukuphepha
safety.description: Ukuqinisekisa ukufinyelela okusheshayo ezindaweni eziphephile nokusekela kwabesifazane ezimweni zenkinga.

dignity.title: Isithunzi
dignity.description: Ukunikeza izinsiza ezibalulekile kuyilapho kugcinwa isithunzi nobumfihlo bomfazi ngamunye.

community.title: Umphakathi
community.description: Ukwakha inethiwekhi eqinile yokusekela ngezinyathelo eziqhutshwa umphakathi nokubambisana.

about.techDescription: I-EmpowerHub isebenzisa ubuchwepheshe besimanje ukunikeza ipulatifomu yokusekela ehlanganisiwe. Umboniso wethu wamanje ubonisa isikhombimsebenzisi nezici eziyinhloko, ngezinhlelo zokuhlanganisa izici ezithuthukisiwe okuhlanganisa:

futureFeaturesList.metamask: Ukuhlanganiswa kwe-MetaMask ukuze kube nokuthengiselana okuphephile

about.demoNote: Lolu mboniso ubonisa umqondo wesisombululo esihlanganisiwe, esiklanywe ukuvumela ukuthuthukiswa okuzimele kwezici kuyilapho kugcinwa ulwazi lomuntu osebenzisayo oluhambisanayo. Ukwakheka okuyizingxenye kuvumela ukuthuthukiswa kwekusasa ngaphandle kokuphazamisa ukusebenza okuyinhloko.
